info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.marketPlace

Class Offer

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.marketPlace.Offer

  • @Entity
public class Offer
extends Object
    With an offer a player can create a task for other players. At this point of time an initial bid in terms of coins is set which is obtained by the person who completes it. The initial bid can be raised by other colleagues in order to increase the incentive of fulfilling the task. When a player has completed a Task that belongs to an offer, she/he will obtain all bids as a reward. The particular task is then also added to the playerâ€™s list of the finished tasks.

      • getAllowedForRole

        public List<Role> getAllowedForRole()
        Gets the roles to check which player is allowed to fulfil this offer. A player need at least one role to complete the task.
        Returns:
        A List of Roles. All roles which are allowed to fulfil the offer.

      • setAllowedForRole

        public void setAllowedForRole(List<Role> allowedForRole)
        Sets a list of roles for the task. Players who have at least one of these roles are allowed to fulfil the task and award the prize.
        Parameters:
        allowedForRole - The roles of which a player must have at least one to fulfill this task.

      • addRole

        public void addRole(Role role)
        This method adds a further role to the list of roles. If a player has got one of these roles she/he is allowed to fulfil the task.
        Parameters:
        role - The new role which is added to the list of roles.

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer()
        Gets the player who has created the offer.
        Returns:
        Player The player object of the player who has created the offer.

      • belongsTo

        public boolean belongsTo(Organisation organisation)
        This method checks if the API key of a role is equal to the organisation's one. So it checks if the role also belongs to this organisation.
        Parameters:
        organisation - The organisation which is tested. This parameter is required.
        Returns:
        boolean The value if a offer belongs to the specific organisation (true) or not (false).
